version_description:
Thank you for all the feedback we have received over the last 12 months. We are proud to present the new Express App.

This update includes:
• New design for section pages, navigation and article pages
• Faster loading of stories
• Improved video player
• More galleries
• Offline Mode to read the top stories of the day without internet connection

We endeavour to make the Express app the best it can be. Please email us at digitalproduct@express.co.uk with any suggestions and feedback you have

Thank you for all the feedback we have received over the last 12 months. We are proud to present the new Express App.

This update includes performance and stability improvements.

We endeavour to make the Express app the best it can be. Please email us at digitalproduct@express.co.uk with any suggestions and feedback you have
Updated video player, performance improvements and bug fixes.
This release is a bug fix update to keep your experience as smooth as possible. We will be back soon with a much bigger update. #StaySafe
